runs.comm: how did that miss the stumps? What a ball to start with. Angled in, pitching on off, and seaming away, Rohit Sharma had no idea about that one. Straight past him to the keeper
seaming away on a length again, Rohit's prod can't connect
lovely shape from Watson, but this one is too wide to cause any damage. Swinging in the air then seaming away from Sharma
saw the swing and got a little overexcited. Angles this way too far down the leg side, and though there was some swing, that's a good-sized wide
swinging out to pitch on off stump and straightening, Sharma comes forward to defend
swinging away again, but this is wider and short of a length, Rohit opens the face and runs it to third man
angled across, and ends up slightly wide. Dhawan cuts that good length ball straight to point
lovely pick-up shot, but that was a poor ball to start. Fullish delivery on leg stump, Sharma flicks that off his pads high over backward square leg for four
shortish ball outside the off stump, cut away late to third man
that's on the pads as well, but Dhawan hit it much straighter than Sharma, lofting it over the infield to deep midwicket
drops a few metres short of third man. That was full and slightly wide, Dhawan advances and gets under it, carving it high, but it lands safe

he's struggled with that ball today, and Clint McKay's got caught behind. Fullish outside off stump and seaming away, Sharma aims a big off drive but only gets an outside edge and that's an easy take for Haddin. No Mumbai-esque heroics today.
fullish outside off stump, Raina lifts that square over the off side and third man has some work to do. Cuts it off just inside the fence.
short of a length ball, angled across. Dhawan cuts it aerially to third man, who takes it on the bounce
short ball wide of off stump, Raina plays at it but misses
short of a length just outside off stump, driven down the ground on the up
off line that time, and Dhawan gets a glove on it to get it past a diving Haddin. Short ball, chest, high, but on the legside, and that's an easy boundary
length ball on the stumps, turned into the leg side and into a gap
strays on the legs again, and is punished once more. Raina gets low and flicks it in the air, behind square, well away from any fielders
length ball, quite wide and flayed through the offside by an advancing Dhawan. He shuffled forward and had enough room to free his arms, just beats the mid-on fielder to the fence
that's struck even harder, and through the air this time. Comes down the pitch and turns a length ball into a full one. Opens his face on the drive and sends it above cover for cour,
length ball on the stumps, he's happy to drop that onto the leg side and take a quick single

length ball on middle stump, but that wristily carved away with remarkable power by Raina. He backed away, but he was still cramped for room by the ball angling in, somehow times it well enough to beat the cover fielder and run to the fence
length ball outside off stump, opens the face and gets it towards third man
length ball on off stump, Dhawan gets it on the inside half of the bat and there's no run
full, just outside off stump. Raina goes for a big swing but misses
fullish and on the pads, turned away to the deep square leg
length ball outside off stump, driven through the gap in the offside infield to deep cover
this is straying well onto the pads, Raina probably should have got it to the fine leg fence, but misses with a big sweep, hit his pad and they run through
Dhawan's down the track again, and he drives that straight to extra cover, but they can still run one
full on middle stump, clipped away to the on side
length ball on the stumps, batsman backs away and opens the face on a drive, but it's straight to the fielder.
poor line and punished. Short ball on leg stump, Raina steps forward and pulls, and that goes over fine leg after having taken the top half of the bat.

but the short ball does Raina in again. This one is much better directed, probably over off stump. Raina tries to pull, is late on it and it takes the top edge, going high. Watson at midwicket goes back a few metres and takes the catch over his shoulder.
full toss on middle stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
shortish ball on the stumps, Kohli defends that to the leg side
shortish ball outside the off side, slower one I think, Kohli pulls that well in front of square and the leg side sweeper runs around to stop it
length ball, wide of the stumps, Dhawan advances and cuts that to deep point
full and outside off stump, clipped away wristily to the man on the legside fence
slower ball, full and on middle, Dhawan's down the track again and driving that to deep cover
full ball on the stumps, driven down the ground to long on
slower ball again, fullish and on the stumps, knocked down into the legside infield where there is a run to be had
full toss outside off stump, hit to long on for a single
good shot first up from Kohli, not much wrong with the ball. Batsman advances and hits the length ball on off stump powerfully back past the bowler and to the straight fence
length outside off stump,chopped into the pitch and there's no run
shortish on off stump, pulled well in front of square again and the deep midwicket runs around to keep it to two
backs away and plays that wonderfully late. Beats a diving short-third man, who dives in vain
length ball on the stumps hit into the legside infield for a single
short and wide, cut powerfully and the diving deep point fielder can't cut it off. Poor ball, and it was hit hard enough to beat a packed offside field.
sends the first one wide down the leg side, good collection by the keeper
tosses it up and straightens it on off stump, the batsman drives to deep cover
pitched wide of off stump and straightening, but not enough. Dhawan rocks back and cuts that short ball in between point and short third man, all the way to the fence

he's been coming down the wicket so often, maybe Doherty thought this would just be a matter of time. Dhawan bounds down the pitch again and Doherty pitches it short and wide again. If Dhawan had stayed on the crease, he could have cut this one away too. Maybe he thought Doherty would over-correct and bowl the full delivery. Either way, he's way out of his crease, and is stumped.
fullish outside off stump, driven to long off
full on the pads, Kohli just turns this away to deep midwicket
fullish outside off stump again, and straightening. Yuvi opens the face and gets it past the keeper
short ball, chest-high, on off stump. Yuvraj climbs to defend that onto the pitch and they scamper through
short of a length on off stump, Kohli runs it to third man
length ball on middle stump, turned tidily around the corner by Yuvraj, considered two, but stayed with the one
full and outside the stumps, driven right into the ground by Kohli. Cover cleans up
length ball outside off stump, Kohli shuffles across and drops that into the big gap in the legside infield
full, on the stumps, and that's Yuvraj's first boundary. Picks that up effortlessly off his toes and sends it over midwicket and to the fence. All timing in that shot.
starts the over with a big hit, whacks that over long-off, connects superbly and that's taken beyond the boundary quite well by someone possibly from the India support staff
worked in front of square leg for a couple, India move to 99
short of length ball on off stump, chopped off the back foot towards cover, dot ball
length ball spinning just a bit away towards off, pushed off the front foot
fired this flat as usual, keeps it on off stump, another dot ball, big shot next?
nope, the final ball is clipped towards square leg for a single, India's 100 comes up, Doherty does well after that first-ball six

McKay's uncanny ability to take wickets is on show again, this time he gets the big one of Kohli, who charged down the track to a short of length ball, looking to muscle that over wide long-on, caught just within the rope at wide long-on

slower one from McKay, Yuvraj had to wait for that to arrive, was initially looking to power that through the off, instead changes to a cute dab past the dab, a bit of an edge but wide past the keeper
eases this behind point for a single, chants of 'Dhoni, Dhoni' around the ground
short of length ball on middle and off, clipped towards square leg for a single, Dhoni gets his first run
fuller and angling into off stump, pushed out in front of point
wild from Yuvraj, a slower one that doesn't rise much, Yuvraj's attempt to swipe that through the leg side meets nothing but air
short of length ball on the pads, nudged towards deep backward square leg, Dhoni zips through for two
short of length ball outside off, immense power from Dhoni, absolutely rips that over extra cover off the back foot for four, flat-batted muscular hit
similar length, closer to off stump, poked towards cover for a single
keeps it on the shorter side, Yuvraj goes for the pull but once again he doesn't connect
short of length ball on legstump, Yuvraj swings it towards deep backward square leg, doesn't hit it as well as he wanted

short of length again from Watson, Dhoni turns that towards square leg and charges through for the single, intending to come back for the second, even he isn't quick enough for that though, settles for one
just outside off, dabbed towards third man for a single
a touch short, slower one from McKay, Yuvraj backs himself to clear the man in the deep and the midwicket rope, he does easily, that's six

that was almost perfect from Watson, what an outstanding effort after Yuvraj flicks a length ball towards the deep square leg boundary, Watson had to jump to get a hold of that at the rope, does well to catch, then he throws the ball up as he realises he is going to cross the rope, he comes back in to pouch the ball once more but his leg has just touched the rope as he takes it the second time
on the pads, that is helped along towards fine leg for four, India staying in this chase
on legstump again, worked towards fine leg for a single
pushes this to the off side to end the over, dot ball
a high full toss outside off, lucky to get away with that one, Yuvraj can only slap that towards point
beautiful from Yuvraj, that was a length ball that is lofted effortlessly over extra cover, stylishly four from Yuvraj
full and down the leg side, that is called a wide
slower one, full from Coulter-Nile, Yuvraj sees the mid-off is in the circle and launches this over him, another boundary for Yuvraj
low full toss just outside off, sends that towards sweeper cover for a couple
length ball outside off, driven towards long-off for a single
nearly sneaked under the bat, that was full and outside off, Dhoni looked to jam that towards the off side, gets a single for his efforts

both batsmen had close calls there, Dhoni nearly chipping a return catch to the bowler, who then fired the ball at the non-striker's stumps to try get Yuvraj run-out, he misses the stumps but the ball thuds into the umpire
single towards mid-on
a cross-batted swipe towards long-on for a single, not the most aesthetic of strokes
fired in quick, on the pads, looking to work that to the leg side, can't connect, good over so far
too short from Doherty, in this mood Yuvraj isn't going to miss out, fiercely puts that away to the wide long-on boundary for four, two fielders could only watch it race by
pushed back towards the bowler to end the over
Faulkner starts the over with a full and wide delivery, Dhoni reaches out and sends that in front of point, Bailey does well at point to cut that off
pitched up and heading for the pads, Yuvraj looking to whip that to the leg side, he misses, hits the pads but that would have missed leg stump
a low full toss on off stump, superb delivery that, pushed out towards long-off for a single

length ball on middle and off, sensational hit from Yuvraj Singh, a straight six, hardly seemed to be putting any effort in that, the ball sails towards the sightscreen and that's a 25-ball half-century for Yuvraj

six more, length ball angling in towards the pads, Yuvraj can't quite free his arms but still manages to get enough power as he swipes that over deep square leg for six more, 59 off 26 now, what a comeback this is from Yuvraj
oh dear, in three balls this game might have got out of Australia's hands, this was a wild wide down the leg side, five free runs, Faulkner can't believe it
much better this time from Faulkner, keeps it full and just outside off, squeezed to the off side by Yuvraj, dot ball

Dhoni's been mainly getting singles and twos but India still keeping up with the asking rate, showing up how well Yuvraj has done, this time Dhoni pushes a full ball outside off towards point for a single
length ball outside off, steered towards backward point, Dhoni screams 'No, no, no' as the batsmen think of a single
full and wide, too wide according to the umpire, right call from the ump too
four more, a length ball well outside off, Yuvraj reaches out for that one and lofts it over cover, places it wide of sweeper cover as well, no stopping Yuvi
full ball just outside off, eased towards long-off for a single
full toss, low and on middle stump, another single for Dhoni, who taps the ball towards long-off
six more, Yuvraj is walking this, this game is dead and buried, a full toss on the pads, nonchalantly put away over midwicket for another six
length ball on middle, Dhoni clips this towards square leg for one more, Dhoni happy to let yuvraj go slam-bang
it's only boundaries from Yuvraj, this was a low full toss outside off, calmly steers it behind backward point for four more
full and on the pads, clipped towards deep midwicket for one more
good delivery from Faulkner, full ball on middle, worked towards midwicket for a single
full toss well outside off, Yuvraj leans across and jabs the ball behind point
low full toss on off stump, worked towards point by Dhoni
starts with a short ball that is pulled away towards deep square leg for a single
Dhoni looks to finish the game with a big six over long-off, it was in the slot outside off, Dhoni doesn't connect though

all those field changes doesn't matter, not to Dhoni in the final over, this man has tremendous power, it was a terrific delivery, nearly yorker length, outside off, Dhoni just powers that to the cover boundary for four
full toss well outside off, through to sweeper cover, that will do, fireworks in Rajkot (literally) as India win with two balls to spare
